settings.location: Kundasang, Sabah
settings.shortIntroduction: Nestled between the Kundasang roundabout and the renowned Desa Milk Farm, Tisan Nulu beckons with a selection of welcoming rooms and charming bungalows. Indulge in the added convenience of shared kitchen and BBQ facilities. Here, amidst stunning views of Mount Kinabalu from the relaxation deck, you're invited to craft unforgettable moments.
settings.shortIntroductionBm: Terletak di antara bulatan Kundasang dan Ladang Susu Desa yang terkenal, Tisan Nulu menawarkan pelbagai bilik yang menarik dan banglo yang mempesonakan. Nikmati keselesaan tambahan dengan kemudahan dapur bersama dengan peralatan BBQ. Di sini, anda menyaksikan pemandangan menakjubkan Gunung Kinabalu dari dek bersantai, dan mencipta kenangan yang tidak terlupakan.
settings.landingPageNotice:
Please read carefully.
Terms & Conditions
Number Of Person
- is the total number, including kids above 12 years old.
- You should book according to the number of person.
House Rules
- Smoking and pets are not allowed anywhere in the compound.
- You can cook in the kitchen (bungalow) or sharing kitchen (family block).
- Please do not make loud noises especially from 10pm-7am.
- Please respect the check-in-time of 3pm to 6pm, and check-out-time of 9am to 11am.
- You cannot check in after 6pm unless with prior special arrangement.
Cancellation Policy
- All prepaid bookings are NON-refundable and NON-transferable.
- No cancellation will be applied once booking is confirmed.
- You must provide notice, at least 30 days before actual date for any amendment, and it will be subject to room availability.
- No show or Non-arrival will result in forfeiture of the payments.
settings.landingPageNoticeBm:
Terma dan Syarat
Bilangan orang
- Sila membuat tempahan berdasarkan jumlah bilangan orang termasuk budak berumur 12 tahun dan ke atas.
Peraturan
- Dilarang merokok dan membawa haiwan ke dalam kawasan ini.
- Anda boleh masak di dapur rumah bungalow, atau di dapur-sharing untuk blok family.
- Sila senyap dari jam 10 malam sehingga 7 pagi untuk menjaga keharmonian semua pihak.
- Sila patuh kepada masa check-in 3pm ke 6pm, dan masa check-out 9am ke 11am.
- Anda tidak dapat check-in selepas jam 6pm kecuali sudah atur khas dengan kita lebih awal.
Polisi Pembatalan
- Segala bayaran yang dibayar adalah TIDAK dikembalikan dan TIDAK boleh dipindah-milik
- Tempahan yang telah disahkan TIDAK boleh dibatalkan
- Anda mesti memberitahu pihak pengurusan sekurang-kurangnya 30 hari sebelum tarikh datang untuk apa-apa perubahan. Dan perubahan itu adalah bergantung kepada ketersediaan bilik.
- Kalau anda tidak datang, semua bayaran adalah hangus secara otomatik.

settings.breakfastDescription: Simple breakfast with coffee or tea

information.How to book:
Booking your spot with Tisan Nulu is a straightforward 3-step process:


(1) Reserve Your Spot
Visit TisanNulu.com to check availability and pricing. Complete the contact information section to place your booking.

arrowDown(2) Make Payment
Transfer the required amount to the bank account displayed on your screen. You may use any bank that is convenient for you.
arrowDown(3) Submit Payment Proof
Upload your payment proof at TisanNulu.com/payment.

âœ… Success! It's that simple.

Note:
You must complete all steps within 30 minutes, or you will need to start over.

Note for Mac/iOS user:
This app works best in the Chrome browser.

If you need help / Kalau perlu Bantuan / æ‚¨ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è”ç»œ
+6 019 5588 600
information.Car Rental: We also provide Car Rental Services, offering the flexibility for you to choose either self-driving or opt for our convenient packages with a dedicated driver and inclusive petrol.
information.Location:
When you reach Kundasang roundabout, go towards Mersilau/Desa. Go straight down the hill until you reach a river. Then go uphill for 1.7km, you will see a T-junction. Turn right into the gravel road at the T-junction and you will see our entrance in about 30 seconds.

Google Map

Tisan Nulu Kundasang
information.Layout: We offer a homestay experience with a Bungalow and a Family Block comprising 10 rooms. Nestled between these accommodations are a convenient car park and a shared kitchen, enhancing the overall stay for our guests.
information.Family Block:
10 Rooms at Family Block

Layout


Deluxe Queen (2pax) (Best View)


Triple Single (3pax)


Superior Room (3pax)


Family Double Queen (4pax)
information.Shared Kitchen: [ SHARED KITCHEN FOR THE ROOMS ]
information.Weather of Sabah:
Sabah has a tropical hot and humid weather (equatorial climate). Temperatures normally ranging from 20Â°C (68Â°F) to 32Â°C (90Â°F).

Weather in Kundasang is much colder as it is at a higher elevation and located just next to Kinabalu Park World Heritage.
information.Number of person: We kindly recommend booking accommodations based on the number of individuals in your party. While we do not strictly enforce head counts, we encourage this practice for your comfort. Staying with an appropriate number of guests per room ensures a more pleasant experience, particularly given that each room is equipped with only one toilet. Your understanding and cooperation contribute to a more enjoyable stay for everyone.
information.Camping: Camping is permitted, contingent upon the prevailing circumstances, and is accompanied by a nominal camping fee assessed per person. It's important to note that the availability of camping spaces is subject to the situation and dates. During peak season, excessive vehicles in the car park may occasionally limit camping possibilities.
information.Check in Check Out Time:
Reception is open for

check in: 2pm - 6pm
check out: 8am - 11am

Please take note that reception is close by 630pm

Owner contact
0178338600

0136670918

019 5588 600
information.Photo: You can browse our photos gallery here: Photos Gallery where you can also add your own photos!
information.Enquiry: If you have any questions that is not covered above, you may contact us in WhatsApp.
